dc_title_s: An ice-water classification dataset for learning from label proportions 2015 [Canada]
dc_description_s: An ice-water classification dataset for machine learning researchers to test algorithms related to learning from label proportions. The dataset includes patches extracted from 10 RADARSAT-2 dual-polarized scenes, Egg Code polygon (bag) IDs, labels, and the estimated proportion of each bag provided by ice experts.
